information.aboutmep: Hello! My name is Julian Andrés Ariza Pérez, a software developer residing in Zipaquirá, Colombia. I enjoy creating innovative and efficient solutions to solve any problems that clients may face. I have 2 years of experience as a freelancer, working on various web projects and applications using languages and frameworks such as React and C#. Additionally, I am a final year student in the Bachelor’s degree in Systems Engineering, and I pursue independent and autonomous studies. I love learning new things and keeping up with the latest trends and tools in software development. I consider myself a creative, proactive, and detail-oriented developer who always seeks the best solution for each problem.
